TextBody:
Hello Mauricio,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to provide you with an update regarding the Ubuntu version that will be used in our next release.
Following an internal review and confirmation from our technical team, we would like to inform you that the upcoming appliance VM will continue using Ubuntu 22.

We appreciate your patience as we gathered this information and are committed to ensuring a smooth experience with our product.

Should you have any further questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to us at any time. 

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
